title: Best Technology Award
desc: Awarded to the team with the most advanced/creative use of technology at the Wildhacks hackathon, 45+ teams at large

title: Weingartner Scholarship
desc: Awarded to exceptional members of the Church who volunteer and support the Rockford community regularly

title: UIC Logmaster CS Scholarship
desc: Awarded to students who have demonstrated computer science academic excellence at the University of Illinois Chicago

title: UIC Victor & Lucy Kan Scholarship
desc: Awarded to students who have demonstrated multi-disciplinary academic excellence at the University of Illinois Chicago

title: UIC P. V. Sudhindra Scholarship
desc: Awarded to students who have demonstrated multi-disciplinary academic excellence at the University of Illinois Chicago

title: AP Capstone Diploma
desc: Given to students who earn scores of 3 or higher on AP Seminar and AP Research, and on 4 additional AP Exams of their choosing

title: AP Scholar
desc: Given to students who receive scores of 3 or higher on 3 or more AP Exams

title: IESA State Chess Champions
desc: A member of the 2016 state-winning chess team as board 6 of 8, 45+ teams at large
